page.title: 01OUR AREA - GENERAL
page.content: Our area includes parts of 3 parishes - Bucknall, Stixwould and Horsington. All of the built up area of Horsington is included, most of Bucknall, but only a small part of Stixwould. {Bucknall}(Pop: 241 ) has a primary school, church, chapel, general shop with post office, shop for horse accessories, village hall, and garage. There is a football club, Tuesday Club (for pensioners), youth club, and Sunday School in the church. A bus service from Lincoln to Horncastle passes through Bucknall.{Horsington (Pop: 206 ) has a church, village hall, and snooker club. Its primary school closed in July 1984. There is a Tuesday Club for pensioners.Buses to Lincoln/Horn'tle.{Stixwould}(Pop: 127 ) has a church, village hall, and mother & baby club. It has no public transport. (Populations: 1981 figures)
